channel.title: Project First Pirch
channel.description: Daily release notes for Project First Pirch.

item.title: Release Notes 2025-12-01
item.description:
December 1st, 2025 - get CV to work on the endpoint
next: - create a queue, - with an ecs worker to consume jobs - aws batch or step functions - poll from frontend to get status updates - update UI - password protect site

item.title: Release Notes 2025-11-09
item.description: November 9th, 2025 - Fix DNS again - add astro site - add python service - add VPC - add Cluster

item.title: Release Notes 2025-10-29
item.description: October 29th 2025 - Use AWS Name Servers - Update has not processed, check tomorrow - - dig NS nicksadd.com - todo: update python tomorrow to fix mixed-content errors

item.title: Release Notes 2025-10-27
item.description: October 27th 2025 - Add card to AWS account - Start connecting DNS records

item.title: Release Notes 2025-10-26
item.description: October 26th 2025 - Purchase NickSadd Domain Name - Start RSS Feed for Tracking in TRMNL - Start Project First Pitch
